Title: Sayonara Zetsubou Sensei Jo: Zetsubou Shoujo Senshuu
Description:
['A special summary episode of the first season of Sayonara Zetsubou Sensei, focusing on seven of the girls: Komori Kiri, Matoi Tsunetsuki, Kobushi Abiru, Kimura Kaere, Kitsu Chiri, Sekiuchi "Maria" Tarou and Hitou Nami.', '
', '
', '
', '
Note: This entry also includes the 24 minute version which aired on BS11.']
Related: ['Adaptation: Aura: Maryuuin Kouga Saigo no Tatakai']
Characters: ['Itoshiki, Nozomu', 'Fuura, Kafuka', 'Komori, Kiri', 'Tsunetsuki, Matoi', 'Hitou, Nami', 'Sekiutsu, Tarou', 'Kobushi, Abiru', 'Kimura, Kaere', 'Kitsu, Chiri', 'Fujiyoshi, Harumi']
Voices: ['Kamiya, Hiroshi', 'Nonaka, Ai', 'Tanii, Asuka', 'Sanada, Asami', 'Shintani, Ryouko', 'Sawashiro, Miyuki', 'Gotou, Yuuko', 'Kobayashi, Yuu', 'Inoue, Marina', 'Matsuki, Miyu']
